document.full_text: dirk nowitzki overcame illness tuesday night and led the dallas mavericks over the miami heat in game 4 of in the n.b.a. finals.
document.title: victory cures all that ails nowitzki and the mavericks
lines_and_colors: dirk nowitzki overcame illness tuesday night and led the dallas mavericks over the miami heat in game 4 of in the n.b.a. finals.
